name: Scavenger (itch) (QueenRoserade407)
description:
Scavenger is a cooperative resource hunting survival game meant for 4 players. At the beginning of the game, each player gets a Player Reference card, and a life counter. Players also can choose which Goal to play with or they may choose randomly. Which Goal is chosen determines how many turns the game will last. The game ends when either the objective is reached, all players die, or the time limit is reached.

Scavenger includes: 

35 Encounter Cards, 4 Goal Cards, 32 Grassland Cards 

36 Item Cards, 40 Mountain Cards, 4 Reference Cards 

1 Camp Card, 42 Urban Cards, 7 Weather Cards 

60 Resource Chips, 10 Dice, 4 Player Pieces 

4 Life Counters, 1 Turn Counter
